title: Huawei Watch_Can the Huawei Watch monitor my heart rate? How can I view my heart rate?
answer:
Yes. The Huawei Watch can monitor your heart rate.

Swipe left on the watch's home screen and touch **Heart rate** ![](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/73444_kdqma.png) to view your heart rate.

Do not wear the strap too tight or too loose as this may affect your heart rate data.

Test your heart rate when you have been resting for a while. The result should not be used for medical purposes.
